site_title: FastShip Global - Connecting Travelers with Shippers Worldwide
global_message: Global platform connecting travelers and shippers worldwide
hero_title: Global Shipping Platform - Connecting Travelers with Shippers
hero_description: First global platform connecting travelers (by car, truck, plane, train, bus) with shippers worldwide. Save money and utilize empty space during your travels.
search_city_placeholder: Search your city (Riyadh, Dubai, London, New York...)
city_suggestions: Suggestions: Riyadh, Dubai, London, Paris, New York, Tokyo
services_description: We provide comprehensive solutions for all types of shipments and carriers
individual_travelers_desc: For travelers by plane, train, or bus with up to 20kg space
car_owners_desc: For private car owners with up to 1500kg space
truck_owners_desc: For truck owners with up to 50 tons space
shipping_fleets_desc: For companies and shipping fleets with up to 1000 tons space
how_it_works_description: 4 simple steps to connect shipments with suitable carriers
create_account_desc: Register on the platform and choose your service type (carrier or shipper)
add_trip_shipment_desc: Add details of your trip or shipment with route, dates, and available space
smart_matching_desc: Our system will automatically match shipments with compatible trips
communication_delivery_desc: Communicate with the other party through the platform and arrange delivery details
verification_description: To ensure reliability and security of all transactions
verification_intro: We ensure verification of all users to guarantee a safe and reliable environment for everyone:
business_verification: Business registration verification for store owners
rating_system: Rating and review system for users
footer_description: A platform connecting carriers with shippers worldwide using smart matching technologies.
designed_by: Designed and developed by Gaid Al-Masabi
